definitions: To get or bring something back from somewhere.
To find and bring back data or information from a computer or other storage device.
To rescue or save something from a dangerous or difficult situation.
To recall or remember something from one's memory.
examples: She went to retrieve the ball from the bushes.
The system can retrieve customer data quickly.
Firefighters tried to retrieve valuables from the burning house.
He struggled to retrieve the forgotten name.
